channel.title: Boxman
channel.description:
Hello all, I made this poll to address the future of my game, Boxman. If you don't know what that is see this thread [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,608151.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,608151.0.html [/url]
I will release an open source version of Boxman if I get 30 votes for yes. I want you to comment features and I will do my best to add them.
The current features are in the original Boxman thread.
Features in Progress: Bombs- because I am to lazy to fix the bug that completely encloses a ball, thus making the game impossible. (Done) Getting rid of the TextIO library for file handling (Done) Fixed sk8rdudes bugs, 1,2,3 working on 4 (will be released)
Bug fixes-Updated version on original thread and below What the bombs do is blow up barriers.
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Boxman.jar
Because Lin is a forum nazi, here is the source
http://dl.dropbox.com/u/59761129/Source.rar
Current status: Rebuilding from the ground up: Currently working on the map maker

item.title: Boxman
item.dc:creator: @Scyth1 Scyth_
item.description:
@Scyth1 wrote:

Lin:

Just release it open-source because we are an open-source community. You’re not going to get 30 votes. And this might come as a surprise to you, but did you know you can edit your topic?! That’s right, you actually don’t need to create a new one for the same thing! Amazing!

Im aware, no one needs your shit

And to Sk8rdude, yes there is a map generator/ maker. In the start menu, go to File> Map Maker

Read full topic

item.title: Boxman
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Scyth_, post:5, topic:503203”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=621428.msg4250129#msg4250129 date=1362291891]

Some bugs from the already released version: (In case you don’t know)

  1. Bombs do not respawn game from game. You get 5 per run of the .jar.
  2. The enemy spawns moving through walls if they are within 3 spaces of his spawn square.
  3. The player can spawn in a wall.
  4. The enemy can get caught on corners of the walls.

I did not know of number one. Thanks

1 and 3 fixed

number 2:

[img]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t499/202685/Fail_zps30a46d9b.png[/i mg]

^ that is within 2 squares of spawn

What I mean within 2 squares of spawn, is he can go through them. Meaning the downmost walls, he can go through em on first spawn. I’ll attempt to get some footage of it or something.
[/quote]

Just make a map in the map generator that applies to what your talking about[/quote]

There’s a map generator???

oh and:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S3EB4nqIovw[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: Boxman
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Just release it open-source because we are an open-source community. You’re not going to get 30 votes. And this might come as a surprise to you, but did you know you can edit your topic?! That’s right, you actually don’t need to create a new one for the same thing! Amazing!

Read full topic

[/quote]
